revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Narrative of the campaign in India, which terminated the war with Tippoo Sultan, in 1792. With maps and plans illustrative of the subject, and a view of Seringap..."
revision.text: Possibly: A Narrative of the campaign in India, which terminated the war with Tippoo Sultan, in 1792. With maps and plans illustrative of the subject, and a view of Seringapatam. By Major Dirom, deputy adjutant general of His Majesty's Forces in India. By Alexander Dirom. (London : Printed by W. Bulmer and Co. and Sold by W. Faden, Charing-Cross; G. Nicol, Pall-Mall; and J. Sewell, Cornhill, 1793). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2511699~S1
